QuestData.Title: Nook News
QuestData.Description:
You there, $r.
You look well-travelled.
My cousin Wayun was bringing a catch over from Whaler's Nook and mentioned that some... strange folk have set up camp over there.
They appear to be behaving themselves, but would you mind checking in on Wayun?
He can be a bit salty.
QuestData.LogDescription: Visit Whaler's Nook in the Azure Span.
